title: Introduction to Python & Data
text:
Welcome!
Python is a powerful programming language that is suitable for scientific computing and general-purpose programming. Python is used to write scripts to work efficiently and reproducibly with scientific data.
In this workshop, we will utilize the Jupyter Notebook interface and take you from the basics of Python syntax to using the pandas package to work with data frames. In doing so, we aim to give you the tools and confidence to start exploring Python and all it has to offer.
Our workshop material is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. You can view the license on our GitHub repository.

title: Workshop Materials
text:
Notebooks
We will be using the following Jupyter Notebooks to work on the exercises:

python-101-exercises.ipynb
data-science-with-pandas-exercises.ipynb

title: Workshop Materials
text:
Data
The data for this workshop is from the Portal Teaching Database. We will be using the following datasets:

surveys.csv
species.csv
plots.csv
